add_new_version_no_value_message: The most recent version of this secret is not active and cannot be used as a template. Please retrieve the value from an earlier active version to create your new version.
add_new_version_error: An error has occurred while creating the version
back_to_okms_list: Back to the list of OKMS domains
cas_with_description_tooltip: With CAS enabled, it is necessary to always specify the current version number when making changes.
create_okms_success: Your OKMS domain has been created.
create_okms_terms_and_conditions_confirm: I have read and accept the terms and conditions, the appendix relating to the processing of personal data and the special terms and conditions of OVH services.
create_okms_terms_and_conditions_descrip: To activate your region, you will need to create an OKMS domain. Do you want to continue activating your region?
delete_secret_modal_description: Are you sure you want to delete the secret: {{secretPath}} ? This action cannot be undone.
delete_version_modal_description: Are you sure you want to delete this version? This action cannot be undone.
error_path_allowed_characters: The path can only contain the following characters: A-Z a-z 0-9 . _ : / = @ et -
error_path_structure: The path cannot start or end with '/', or contain two '/' in a row.
onboarding_description_2: Secret Manager is the centralized, fully-managed OKMS-based secret management service for your OVHcloud applications and services.
path_field_helper: To create a hierarchy, use '/' characters. Example: prod/database/MySQL
